text: hey guys it's a Leeson on today's
episode we're going to be making the
ultimate breakup brownie so if you've
just broken up with your significant
other and you want a delicious chocolate
treat to cry into this is going to be
perfect chocolate on chocolate on
chocolate smothered in the dela
coded in ice cream and it's microwavable
so it takes just a couple of minutes to
make let's get started
you will literally only need tablespoons
of each of these ingredients so I've got
a little bit of unsweetened cocoa some
vegetable oil and an egg yolk I've got
copious amounts of Nutella and I'm going
to cook mine today in a mason jar or you
can use a mug some unsalted butter some
chocolate chips a little bit of flour
and some brown and white sugar
you also need just some vanilla essence
and I'm gonna leave the full recipe
quantities in the description box below
so to begin with you want to take your
two sugars so this is your brown sugar
and your white sugar which is like a
castor sugar or a superfine sugar a
little bit of vanilla and I say half a
teaspoon but just pop in a little dab
melt your butter in the microwave and
pour that over and then I'm going to use
a spatula to kind of like mix it all
together
make sure your brown sugar hasn't left
any little lumps or bumps in there and
then you want to add in your egg yolk
not the white and that a little bit of
oil and if you don't have olive oil you
could use like a vegetable oil or canola
oil or you can just add an extra
tablespoon or so of butter if you've got
Nowell mix that all through and then you
can add in your flour and your cocoa so
with the flour I'm using a self raising
flour here which has already got the
baking powder component but I need to
leave details down below if you're using
plain or all-purpose flour mix that
around until it's all nicely combined
and then you can add in your chocolate
chips I say in the recipe two
tablespoons but I used about four
because I think you can never have too
many chocolate chips in the chocolate
brownie so use as many or as few as you
like
once that one's all mixed you want to
scoop it into your mason jar and I love
the mason jars because you can actually
see through them when you're cooking so
you get a better indication as to when
it's done but like I said a mug make
sure it's a big one because you need
room for that ice cream on this brownie
pop that guy off into your microwave so
you want to give him
30-second intervals and all that mine
took a minute and a half but he can take
anywhere from a minute to two minutes to
cook and you'll know your brownies done
when it just lightly springs back when
you touch it in the middle with a spoon
take a copious amount of delicious
Nutella and this is going to be our
brownie frosting pour it on top of your
brownie and if you don't like Nutella or
you're allergic you can use just a
regular frosting or just place some
melted chocolate on top on yours a
couple of generous scoops of ice cream
and your break up brownie is ready to go
these are seriously dangerous because
they're so quick and easy to make and
they're so darn delicious so if I have
one word of advice be careful they're
addictive make sure you subscribe to my
youtube channel my cupcake addiction for
tons more sweets and baking ideas and as
always thanks very much for watching
